name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in modern testing technologies such as **Playwright**, **Cypress**, and **API** testing. Proficient in **JavaScript** (JS) and **TypeScript** (TS) for automation scripts, and skilled in leveraging **Web** protocols and tools for comprehensive QA processes. Strong background in **Relational Databases** and data visualization using **Kibana** and **Grafana** to analyze test results and system behaviors. Demonstrated expertise in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles, enhancing test frameworks and ensuring code quality through rigorous testing practices. Experienced in utilizing **Firebase** for backend testing and implementing A/B Testing strategies for product iterations.
Additionally, I bring hands-on experience with microservices architecture and cloud-native applications, complemented by a passion for mentorship and fostering collaborative team environments to drive innovation. My commitment to building secure and maintainable solutions aligns with industry compliance standards, while my technical acumen ensures that testing processes integrate seamlessly with development cycles.
